title: What is a person who studies technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: To answer this question I would need to know what your definition of technology is. It is not the physical machine that does something. That is only a tool. Technology is the process by which a result is achieved. So to answer your question in the widest sense of meaning. The person who studies technology is anyone who wants to achieve an end result. The answer is a HUMAN. Love lifeTony D

A technologist. -ologist /ɒlədʒɪst $ ɑːl-/ (also -logist) suffix[in nouns] a person who studies or has knowledge of a particular kind of science. Biologist, someone who studies biology. Archeologist, someone who ancient things. Technologist, someone who studies technology. Engineers study engineering.
